ruling: - If all your monsters are sent to the Graveyard simultaneously by the effect of [[Cyber Jar]], [[Raigeki]], etc. and [[Axe of Despair]] is equipped to one of them, you cannot Tribute one of those monsters to return [[Axe of Despair]] to the top of your Deck.  You also cannot Tribute one of the monsters Special Summoned by the effect of [[Cyber Jar]] since the timing has passed.
- Since [[Axe of Despair]] activates in the Graveyard, you can Tribute a monster to return it to the top of your Deck even if [[Imperial Order]] is on the field.
